title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16ยง 17.1 - Preparation and filing of petition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16ยง 17.1 - Preparation and filing of petition

State Regulations

All applications for approval, consent, permission or
certificate of authority shall be by petition duly verified. The petition and
all accompanying documents shall be filed in accordance with the requirements
of section
3.5
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16ยง
17.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
